min_pro <- menu %>% 
  select(Item,Protein) %>%  
  group_by(Item, Protein) %>% 
  filter(Protein >0 )%>% 
  arrange(Protein) %>% 
  head(15)  %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x= reorder(Item, 
                        Protein),
             fill = Item)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = \identity\"
